MSF International was registered Switzerland, and in December 2011 the first annual MSF International General Assembly (IGA) was held. In subsequent years, the IGA will be held in June. The IGA comprises two representatives of each MSF association, two representatives elected by the individual members of MSF International, and the International President. The IGA is the highest authority of MSF International and is responsible for safeguarding MSF's medical and providing MSF entities. The International Board acts on behalf of and is accountable to the IGA.
